title: Image Gallery With Horizontal Scroll
description: In this lab, we will delve into the world of CSS programming to create a responsive image gallery with a horizontal scroll. The purpose of this lab is to teach you how to use CSS properties to create a visually appealing and interactive gallery that allows users to scroll through images seamlessly. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to create a horizontal scrollable image gallery using CSS.

meta.description: Learn how to create a visually appealing and interactive image gallery with a horizontal scroll using CSS.
